Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 48th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1975...
Injured on 6/1/1975 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1982, off James Willman (TOL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1982, off Eric Owings (MAN)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1983, hitting .389 with 3 HR, 4 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Columbus on 6/5/1985...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
